name: Thomas' Recycling Adventure
description:
Help Thomas recycle rubbish whilst avoiding many hazards such as naughty squirrels, exploding acorns, toxic waste, sewer alligators, robots, skeletons, a mischievous fairy, and even a scary fire-breathing dragon! This charming little game has simple controls and is purposely designed for younger children to play. It has in-built cheats to make it even easier for them:

At any time type the name 'THOMAS' to renew you energy, or type the word 'LEVEL' to advance to the next level - but you must defeat the dragon level to see the delightful ending!
